DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to validate a new hand held light emitting diode (LED) device for the measurement of minimal erythema dose (MED) for narrow band Ultraviolet B (UVB) radiation by comparing to the traditional approach of measurement of the minimal erythema dose.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of a New Hand Held Light Emitting Diode Device for the Determination of Minimal Erythema Dose (MED)
DOC.criteria: 1. Age greater than 18 years. 1. Pregnancy 2. Lactation 3. History of photosensitivity disorder 4. Photosensitizing medications 5. Personal history of melanoma or nonmelanoma skin cancer. 6. Skin disease on the back
